scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,service "cd ./packages/frontend && npm run serve" "cd ./packages/service && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n frontend,service "cd ./packages/frontend && npm run build" "cd ./packages/service && npm run build"
scripts.deploy: concurrently -n frontend,service "cd ./packages/frontend && npm run build" "cd ./packages/service && npm start"
